abstract: New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman files civil lawsuit seeking at least $40 million, accusing Donald Trump's Trump University of engaging in illegal business practices; claims for-profit investment school was run as unlicensed educational institution and made false claims about its classes, engaging in elaborate bait-and-switch.
lead_paragraph: The New York State attorney general’s office filed a civil suit accusing Donald J. Trump’s for-profit investment school of engaging in illegal business practices.

headline.main: Trump University Made False Claims, Lawsuit Says
headline.print_headline: Trump University Made False Claims, Lawsuit Says

snippet: The New York State attorney general’s office filed a civil suit accusing Donald J. Trump’s for-profit investment school of engaging in illegal business practices....
